title: Teen Injured in Avery St. Shooting
content:
SAVANNAH, Ga. (WJCL) - Savannah-Chatham Metropolitan Police are investigating a Friday night shooting that injured a 16-year-old male.
It happened at Fred Wessels Homes on the 200 block of Avery Street, just after 6 p.m.
The teen was reportedly shot on Randolph Street by an unidentified vehicle, but police say they have no evidence supporting this claim. Preliminary investigation reveals the victim was with a group of teenagers when one of the victims accidentally discharged his gun.
Detectives are following leads to confirm the shooter's identity.
Anyone with information should call CrimeStoppers at (912) 234-2020.
